channel.title: 64bit compiler
channel.description:
this is what i get when i compile and i got jdk [code] The system cannot find the path specified. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
and this is my compiler [code] @echo off title your client cd ./Files "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause
[/code]

item.title: 64bit compiler
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“cruel ko, post:9, topic:386087”]the system cannon find the path specified.

Whats the path and classpath for enviromental variables.Or is it only for 32 bit[/quote]
To set enviromen variables, right click on Computer > Advanced System Settings > Eviroment Variables.

Also, if you want to do better with developing, install the 32bit java instead, 64bit is buggy with some applications.

Read full topic

item.title: 64bit compiler
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

@echo off title Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
That is the one I used to use.

Read full topic

item.title: 64bit compiler
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

@echo off Title Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit

this is my 64 bit run which works just fine…

Read full topic

item.title: 64bit compiler
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

unholy i get this when i compile

The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Jframe.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

damn 64bit

Read full topic

item.title: 64bit compiler
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

this is what i get when i compile and i got jdk

The system cannot find the path specified.
The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

and this is my compiler

@echo off
title your client
cd ./Files
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

Read full topic
